title: Stan Wawrinka Wins a Big Tennis Match at Age 40
summary: Stan Wawrinka is a 40-year-old tennis player who is not young anymore, but he still loves playing. He won a tough first-round match at the Australian Open, a big tennis tournament in Melbourne. He beat Laslo Djere in four sets after losing the first set. Wawrinka has been playing tennis for a long time, and he won the Australian Open in 2014 by beating Rafael Nadal. Now, he is on a farewell tour because he will retire in 2026. Other older players like Marin Cilic also won their matches. Wawrinka said the passion for tennis is still strong, and he is happy to play in Grand Slam tournaments. This victory was special because it was his first win at the Australian Open in five years.
